recommended_degree: Administrasi Pendidikan, Bimbingan Konseling, Psikologi, Kesejahteraan Sosial, Ilmu Komunikasi (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description: The intern will assist the Center of Student Development in preparing, organizing, and maintaining all departmental documentation; supporting data collection and document compilation for DIKTI reporting, accreditation requirements, and other institutional submissions; coordinating the gathering, updating, and dissemination of information related to student competitions, conferences, and development programs; and managing information flows regarding job vacancies, internship opportunities, and other career-related updates for students.
